altTitles.en: A Story about Confessing to an Elf

altTitles.ja: 近所のエルフお姉ちゃんに告白した

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinjo no Elf Onee-chan ni Kokuhaku shita

altTitles.en: I Confessed to the Elf Girl Next Door

altTitles.ja: 陰キャエルフちゃんに告った

altTitles.en: I Confessed to the Gloomy Elf

altTitles.ja: 灼熱カバディ

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.en: Itsuki-kun Wants to Be Corrected.

altTitles.ja: 伊月くんは正されたい

description.en: Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in—a senior, Ririko-senpai, the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her, he purposely messes up his uniform, but Ririko is always one step ahead—!? A heartwarming, dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: 彼女たちは穴をうめたい
They want to fill in the holes.

altTitles.en: They Want to Fill in the Holes

description.en: “Whom will you go out with?” Those were the words Doumoto Genki was confronted with on his first day of high school.  Now he has to figure out which one of the “out of this world” beauties he wants to date!
description.ja: 体が丈夫なことが取り柄である主人公・弦貴。高校に入学することを機に、新たな出会いに胸を膨らませていたところ、突然2人の美少女・カリンと聖から告白される！ そんな彼女たちの目的は彼とドッキングすることだった…!! ドッキングとは一体何か。ドッキングで何ができるのか。そして彼女たちは何者なのか…!?
description.pt-br: **”Com quem você vai sair?”** Essas foram as palavras com as quais Doumoto Genki foi confrontado no seu primeiro dia na escola secundária. Agora ele tem que descobrir qual das belezas “de outro mundo” ele quer namorar!

title.en: Potion wa 160 km/h de Nageru Mono! ~Item-gakari no Ore ga Bannou Kaifukuyaku o Touteki suru Koto de Saikyou no Boukensha ni Nariagaru!?~ @COMIC

altTitles.ja: ポーションは160km/hで投げるモノ！～アイテム係の俺が万能回復薬を投擲することで最強の冒険者に成り上がる!?～@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Potion ha 160 km/h de Nageru Mono! ~Item-gakari no Ore ga Bannou Kaifukuyaku wo Touteki suru Koto de Saikyou no Boukensha ni Nariagaru!?~ @COMIC

altTitles.en: Potions Are Items Thrown At 160 Km/H! ~As An Item Handler, I'll Ascend To Strongest Adventurer By Throwing Cure-All Potions!?~ @COMIC
Throwing Potions at 160km/h! I Will Become the Strongest Adventurer by Throwing a Universal Recovery Medicine!? @COMIC

description.en:
Vino, a member of the A-class adventurer party "Assault," is a potion user, the weakest and lowest level job.

He meets a beautiful swordsman named Canadia, who is known as the God of Death.
He was kicked out of the party and nearly died in a monster attack, but Vino awakened by chance with the single-minded desire to protect her!

He discovered his own strong shoulders and a new way to use potions, even throwing potions to blast monsters to pieces.

Then their adventure began, but at the same time Canadia started to run amok!

An adventure tale with the strongest pushover wife, it begins!

---

**Character Designer:** [Nitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/80544dac-562c-47ec-abb8-35f07ec2bd12)

[Alt Official Raw (NicoNico Manga)](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54976)
description.ja:
Ａ級冒険者パーティ【アサルト】のメンバー・ヴィーノは、最弱にして最底辺職であるポーション使い。

そんな彼が出会ったのは『死神』と呼ばれる美しい剣士カナディアだった。
パーティから追い出され、モンスターの襲撃で死にかけたヴィーノが彼女を守りたい一心で偶然覚醒！

ポーションを投げてモンスターを爆散させるほどの自らの強肩ぶりと、ポーションの新たな使用法に気付く。

それから二人の冒険が始まったのだが……同時にカナディアの暴走も始まってしまう！？
最強の押しかけ嫁と行く冒険譚、開幕！

altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...
The Cool Classmate ◯◯ Years Later...
I Can't Escape, He Won't Let Me Go

altTitles.ja: 逃げられない、逃がさない

altTitles.en: Run Away, From Me

description.en:
An absolute being worshipped by all, he was a slaughterer who trampled on my life. 

I, Daphne, was the daughter of the emperor’s favored concubine. I had a childhood more affluent than anyone else’s, but I incurred the emperor's wrath and, despite being a princess, was treated coldly, practically like a maid.

The one who showed me kindness was Crown Prince Asherad, whom I hoped might one day become part of my family. Asherad had always shone brightly. Everyone was fascinated by him, and everyone submitted to him. As an absolute being who reigned over all, he was no exception to me. 

He was my god. Yet... 

The cruel destroyer of my world I had always believed to be beautiful was none other than Asherad. I tried to escape from the slaughterer who trampled on my life, but...

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: When I Returned to My Hometown, My Childhood Friend was Broken

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimoto ni Kaettekitara Osananajimi ga Kowareteta

altTitles.ja: 地元に帰ってきたら幼馴染が壊れてた

altTitles.pt-br: Quando Voltei Para Minha Cidade Natal, Minha Amiga de Infância Estava Falida

altTitles.tr: Memleketime Döndüğümde Çocukluk Arkadaşım Paramparça Bir Durumdaydı

description.en:
When I was younger, one of my best friends was Kyouko. She was a brash and hotheaded young girl who, even though she was a tomboy, was still loved by her peers. 

To be honest, it’s been a few years since I came back home. The only person I know from there was Kyouko and she seems… different?
description.tr: Gençken en iyi arkadaşlarımdan biri Kyouko'ydu. Cesur ve atılgan bir genç kızdı; tomboy olmasına rağmen, arkadaşları tarafından seviliyordu. Dürüst olmak gerekirse, birkaç yıl sonra eve anca döndüm. Orada tanıdığım tek kişi Kyouko'ydu ve o sanki... biraz değişmişti?
description.pt-br:
Quando eu era mais jovem, uma das minhas melhores amigas era Kyouko. Ela era uma jovem impetuosa e cabeça quente que, embora fosse uma tomboy, ainda era amada por seus colegas.

Para ser sincero, já se passaram alguns anos desde que voltei para casa. A única pessoa que conheço de lá é Kyouko e ela parece... diferente?

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.

altTitles.ja: センシティブ・ボーイ

description.en:
Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming "normal" ...  

A bittersweet story about a boy facing coming-of-age questions about love, sexuality, complexes, and other troubles.

altTitles.ja: きみがローファーをはいたら

description.en:
Rinne Miki is a normal first year's high school girl who loves fashion and is close with her friends.
But, she has a caring personality too, so though she has opposite-sex friends, that never became romantic, and she lived her life without romance.
But, on the day of the school festival, she meets Toma, a boy with a slightly mysterious atmosphere to him... though she's bewildered by how aggressively the younger boy approaches here, gradually, she starts to see him as...?
description.ja:
高校1年生の三木凜音はオシャレが大好きで友達想いな普通の女の子。
でも世話好きの性格もあって、異性とは友達にはなっても恋愛に至ることはなく、恋心とは無縁に生きてきた。
そんな彼女だが、文化祭の日にちょっと不思議な雰囲気の少年・冬馬と出会って…。
グイグイくる年下男子に戸惑いながらも、だんだんと凜音も冬馬のことが…？

description.en: When I was young and reckless, my soul inadvertently crossed into another person, unintentionally altering the course of the world. Thus, I swore never to use my supernatural abilities again. However, in order to save the life of my critically ill younger sister, I had to break that vow. I used my powers on the nurse, Jinzhi, who was taking care of my sister, and crossed over to Jinzhi's childhood to play her role and experience her life. Through this, I discovered that beneath Jinzhi's gentle and elegant facade, there lay dark and mysterious secrets...

altTitles.en: Infinite Wizard

description.en:
This is the tale of a boy dreaming about infinity as a human!

Found abandoned in a stable, Shirone is the son of a hunter—and a peasant through and through.
Despite hardships, he's a genius that manages to learn to read by himself and becomes obsessed with it.

Brimming with genius talent, he goes to the city with his father, where he learns about magic—
beginning his journey as an explosive rising star!

title.en: I Fell in Love, so I Tried Livestreaming.

altTitles.en: I Fell in Love so I'm Streaming it
I'm Streaming Now! Because I Fell in Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Koi Shita no de, Haishin Shite Mita

altTitles.zh: 因為戀愛於是開始直播

altTitles.ja: 恋したので配信してみた

altTitles.es-la: ¡Me enamoré, así que probé el Livestreaming!

description.en: Inuzuka Yuu is unable to make any friends due to his mean face and awkwardness. But because of his enrollment to high school, he has the opportunity to enter the dorms. However, it was a share house between 6 people, 3 girls and 3 boys filled with secrets!?
description.pt: Inuzuka Yuu é incapaz de fazer amigos, devido à sua cara de malvado e seu jeito desajeitado. Mas, devido à sua matrícula no ensino médio, ele tem a oportunidade de entrar no dormitório estudantil. No entanto, era uma casa compartilhada entre 6 pessoas, 3 garotas e 3 garotos cheios de segredos?!
description.ru:
Инузука Юу совсем не умеет улыбаться и всё свое детство был изгоем,но он намерен всё изменить! Поступив в старшую школу он поселяется в общежитии. Кроме него там еще 2 парня и 3 красотки, но что-то тут не так .Что же они скрывают? Совместная жизнь полная тайн и секретов начинается!  
  
[Here's a way to support the author!](https://imgur.com/a/4jBwkXe)
description.es-la: Inuzuka Yuu no puede hacer amigos debido a su cara de delincuente y su torpeza. Pero debido a su inscripción en la escuela secundaria, tiene la oportunidad de ingresar a los dormitorios. Sin embargo, era una casa compartida entre 6 personas, 3 chicas y 3 chicos llenos de secretos.

title.en: The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning

altTitles.zh: 末日狠人：开局囤积万亿物资

altTitles.zh-hk: 末日狠人：開局囤積萬億物資

altTitles.zh-ro: Mò Rì Hěn Rén: Kāijú Túnjī Wàn Yì Wùzī
Mo Ri Hen Ren: Kaiju Tunji Wan Yi Wuzi

altTitles.en: Stockpiling in Apocalypse The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning
The Last All-Knowing Man Collected Trillions of Stuff from Day One

description.en: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: 海が走るエンドロール

altTitles.en: Seaside Cinema Paradise

description.en:
After turning 65 and bereaved of her husband, Umiko visits a cinema for the first time in decades. A shocking, life-changing event awaits her. When she meets Kai, an art student majoring in film, Umiko realises that she wants to make a film. She realises that she is on the side of "the people who want to make films"...
Lured by the waves that stir her heart, the 65-year-old dives into the sea of film!
description.ja:
65歳を過ぎ夫と死別し、数十年ぶりに映画館を訪れたうみ子。そこには、人生を変える衝撃的な出来事が待っていた。海(カイ)という映像専攻の美大生に出会い、うみ子は気づく。自分は「映画が撮りたい側」の人間なのだと……。
心を騒ぎ立てる波に誘われ、65歳、映画の海へとダイブする!!

title.en: When a Villain Meets a Villainess

altTitles.en: When Villainess and Villain Meet
When a Villain meets a Villain

description.en: Atalanta, the head of an underground organization, is infamous for committing violent acts against nobles. One day, she receives a commission from the Emperor to assassinate the tyrant Grand Duke Lionel Bianca. Atalanta dreams of a future where her and the members of her organization can live a normal life, so she accepts the commission and infiltrates the Grand Duchy to assassinate him… But, why can’t he be killed? Will Atalanta be able to safely escape from the Grand Duke, who is suddenly whispering confessions of love?
description.ko:
귀족들을 상대로 악명을 떨치던 제국 뒷세계 조직의 보스, 아탈란테. 
어느 날 황제로부터 폭군 리오넬 비안크 대공을 암살해 달라는 의뢰를 받게 된다.
조직원들과 평범하게 살고 싶었던 아탈란테는 의뢰를 수락하고 
대공성에 잠입해 암살 시도하는데….
하지만 어째서인지 죽지 않아?
한순간에 사랑을 속삭이는 대공에게서 아탈란테는 무사히 탈출할 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: はらぺこ母娘と元カレ家主

altTitles.ja-ro: Hara peko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi

altTitles.en: A Hungry Mother and Daughter and Her Ex-Boyfriend Landlord

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mãe faminta, sua filha e seu ex-namorado proprietário

description.en:
36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. 

One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, 

Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together!
description.ja: 36歳のたかはるは一人暮らし。美大を卒業後、ほそぼそと絵を描いて暮らしていた。そんなある日、17年前に別れた元カノ・キョウが娘のみのりを連れてやってきて「居候をさせて欲しい」という。大学時代同様においしい食べ物につられたキョウにほだされ、三人での生活が始まるが……？
description.pt-br: Takaharu, de 36 anos, mora sozinho. Depois de se formar na Art College, ele vive uma vida tranquila enquanto pinta quadros. Um dia, sua ex-namorada Kyou, com quem ele terminou há 17 anos, vem até ele com sua filha Minori e pede que ele as deixe ficar em sua casa. Assim como nos tempos de faculdade, Kyou se sente atraída pela comida deliciosa, e assim os três passam a morar juntos.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.ja: マイ・クレイジー・ボーイフレンド

description.en:
“Please be my friend.” Suzu, a young man searching for his missing brother, gets tangled up with Yakuza, but ends up being saved by Hana, a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother, but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana…
Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe… love?
A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!

altTitles.ja: ツギハギだらけの最強勇者

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi hagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha

altTitles.en: The Patchwork Hero

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

altTitles.ja: 冥冥冥色聖域

description.en:
*NOTE: This manga contains scenes that may disturbing or triggering. Reader discretion advised!*

---
Maid Refreshment "Comet Bug" stands quietly amidst the bustle of the city. This is a place where both master and lady can return anytime. It is a place where there are "maids" who will gently and calmly accompany the tired hearts of the customers. There, Pero, a new maid, is about to receive her first customer. Pero desperately wants to heal him from his deep wounds, even if only for a moment. 

A warm and sad love story that shines faintly at the maid refreshment shop open late at night.

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

altTitles.es-la: Detrás de la sonrisa de la reina superviviente

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

title.en: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
You Turned off the Pain Setting?
I Turned off the Pain Setting?

altTitles.ja: 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?

description.en:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
description.mn:
Өвдөлтийн мэдрэмж 0, Барих хувь 100!
Виртуал ертөнцийн тоглоомны өвдөлтийн мэдрэмжийн тохиргоог "0" болгосон. Би бүх төгсгөлийг нь дуусгасан цор ганц, тиймээс энэ бол миний 100 дахь оролдлого...гэхдээ сонин байна. Гэнэтхэн, эмчлэгдхээргүй өвчинтэй, бас гол дүрүүд миний төлөө санаа зовж эхэлсэн.
"Би ямар ч өвдөлт мэдрэхгүй болохоор, дүр эсгэх нь зөв юм болов уу?"
Намайг мэдхээс өмнө, энэ гол дүрүүдэд би энэ дэлхийн амар амгалангийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох баатар болчихсон байсан. Одоо өнгөрснөөс хойш, энэ оролдлогын концепц бол энэ ертөнцийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох! Би заавал аз жаргалтай төгсөх хэрэгтэй. Энэ бол миний сүүлчийн оролдлого!

title.en: Kyouiku Mama Saeko: Kono Ko no Tame Nara

altTitles.ja: 狂育ママ・サエコ─この子のためなら─

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyouiku Mama Saeko - Kono Ko no Tame Nara

altTitles.en: Saeko, the Education-Crazy Mom - If It's for This Child

description.en: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor, even if she has no education, even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter, Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter, who looks nothing like her, and today as well, she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.
description.ja: 紗江子は幸せだ。貧乏でも、学歴がなくても、シングルマザーでも。ただ一人、娘の唯さえいれば。美しい紗江子は全く似ていないブサイクな娘を溺愛し、娘のために今日も幸せをかき集める——どんな手を使っても…。

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

altTitles.ja: スキップ・ビート!

altTitles.en: Skip Beat

description.en:
Kyouko Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutaro "Shou" Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyouko overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid.  
  
Shocked and enraged, Kyouko swears to take revenge by outdoing him in show business. With a new look and a new attitude, she joins LME, the agency where Ren Tsuruga (Shou's rival and the #1 actor of LME) works, in the hopes of achieving her goal of destroying Shou's pride.  
  
Along the way, she discovers her true self, makes new friends (and enemies), and finds herself at the heart of some interesting situations that will change her life, and the lives of all others involved, forever.

Do Jeong-mi, the main character, spends the night playing games. On Valentine’s Day in her 2nd year of high school, Jung-mi’s best friend Chae-hee confesses to the most popular senior in school and gets rejected. In order to make her friend Chae-hee’s unrequited love come true, Jung-mi ran a secret Cupid operation, going back and forth between online and offline…

title.en: The S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

altTitles.en: The S-Class Lady

description.en:
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

altTitles.ja: 君が唄う薬恋歌

description.en:
A healer who has the unique ability to cure disease and is said to be the world's last hope. While on an overseas expedition, Laila, a newcomer to the world, meets a beautiful demoness named Lail, who is kept in the royal castle. 

The two live out their predetermined destiny, and what develops between these two is...?
description.ja:
運命に殉じる覚悟はあるか命を讃え、恋を唄う異世界ファンタジー

病を治す異能を持ち、世界最後の希望と言われる薬術師。新米のライラは国外遠征中に、王城で飼われていた美しき妖人レイルと出会う。定められた運命を生きる二人の間に芽生えるものは……。

altTitles.en: Permanent☆God

altTitles.ja: 神様☆パーマネント

description.en:
"I am depressed. Even if I'm a god —."   
16-page oneshot depicting the melancholy of a god.
description.pt-br: Um One-Shot de 16 páginas contando sobre a melancolia de um Deus.

altTitles.en: RMFWM

description.en: Overflowing wealth, exceptional looks. Ilya Bloden's life was perfect.Until she witnessed her fiancé's affair, that is."I changed everything, my taste, my hobbies, I accommodated his every wish… But I won't live like a pushover any longer. I'll get a perfect break up!"For the perfect break up, she finds a new fiancé, Karhan Evantheon. She tried to shield herself with Karhan's fearsome reputation, but…"I found this flower on the battlefield, and I really wanted Illya to see it."Turns out, he was a cute puppy?! Will this engagement be okay?

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

altTitles.en: The World of Canglan
Wind and Sky
The Wind From Cang Lan

description.en:
When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split chapter parts) (S1) + >197 (S2) = >344 chapters
- **Season 1:** vol. 1 ch. 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** vol. 2 ch. 1-197+ (148-344+) (ongoing)

**Note:** season 1 chapter 1-114 is in single page format. Starting with season 1 chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

altTitles.en: A Wizard's Restaurant
The Wizard's Restaurant

description.en:
A man who reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. 

On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. 

They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

title.en: Omae Imouto ja Nakute Iinazuke datta no kayo!?

altTitles.ja: お前妹じゃなくて許嫁だったのかよ!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Omae Imouto Janakute Iinazuke Datta no ka yo

altTitles.ru: Ты была не моей сестрой, а моей невестой!?

altTitles.en: You Weren't My Sister, but My Fiancée?!

description.en:
"Humanity, adore thy little sister—."
"I wonder when my sister Kana started becoming distant from me—."
Shina Takashi lamented his current days, where being ignored was not uncommon. One day, his parents dropped a shocking revelation. Not only was Takashi not their biological son… but he was also the fiancé of Kana, whom he thought was his sister!

From siblings to potential romantic interests, it’s not easy to sort out feelings. The fluctuating emotions, the bewildering distance. Their relationship undergoes an inevitable change—! 
She’s a sister but not a sister! The curtain rises on a new era of sisterly romantic comedy!”

(MTL’d from bookwalker.jp)
description.ja:
**人類よ、妹を愛でろ――。**

いつ頃からだろう、妹の佳奈が自分に冷たくなったのは――。
無視されることさえ少なくない現在の日々を、椎名隆は嘆いていた。
そんなある日、両親から衝撃的な話を切り出される。
なんと隆は実の息子ではなかった……だけではなく、妹だと思っていた佳奈の許嫁だった！

兄妹から気になる異性へ、なんて簡単には気持ちの整理がつくはずもなく。
揺れ動く感情、戸惑う距離感。
二人の関係は否応なく変化して――!?

妹だけど妹じゃない！
新時代の妹ラブコメ、開幕！

title.en: The Girl I Like Confessed to Me While Handing Me Cash

altTitles.ja: 好きだけど好きだから受け取れない

description.en: After being confessed to by his crush, Tachibana, Fujiwara finds himself in complete bliss. When faced with such a joyful occasion, one would normally accept the confession immediately. However, Tachibana's method of confession is quite peculiar—she tries to show her love by handing him a wad of money! Reluctant about exchanging money for love, Fujiwara turns down the offer. Thus begins Tachibana's adorable attempts at gaining Fujiwara's affection.

altTitles.en: Prince's companion
Ryun's Companion

description.en:
Seolru, a novice hunter who lives alone in the deep mountains with her elderly father, because the weather around her changes constantly depending on her emotions. One day, she goes on a night hunt to catch a badger instead of her father and accidentally shoots a person...

«Father, what should I do now? I think I killed a man!»

Ryun, the crown prince of Cloud Dragon, went hunting with his servants, but was caught up in the empress' scheme and wandered the hunting grounds alone. To make matters worse, he collapses after being hit by an arrow shot by Seolru. Gathering all the remaining strength, he tried to kill the killer who approached him, but even that failed...

«Why did you keep me alive? Did they tell you to let me live, because they will come and cut my throat?»

But the killer who's the size of a rat in front of him is not a killer! Besides, he wasn't even a boy, he was a girl in disguise? Seolru, carrying her own sin of hurting the body of the national treasure by shooting an arrow and her father who thrust a dagger unaware of his identity, eventually becomes a trophy of war and follows Ryun into the imperial palace.. The land of dragons hidden by clouds. ‘Seolru’, a young dragon who knows how to command the sky, and ‘Ryun’, the Crown Prince of Unryong, who greedily keeps her by his side.

Can the love between the two, which has just blossomed from the wrong desires surrounding the legends and oracles that have been handed down since the beginning of time, be preserved until eternity?

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

title.en: Oyako de Kaiten Sushi ni Iku Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 親子で回転寿司に行く話

altTitles.en: A Story About Going With My Dad to a Conveyor Belt Sushi Restaurant

description.en: A short story about a little girl and her dad getting some sushi.

The falling of a mysterious seed plunged the entire Earth into an era where all living beings had the qualifications to compete for the top of the food chain. Commander Yue Li, the leader of a special forces team, lost the most important person in his life during the catastrophe. After battling monsters for three years, he himself became a member of the monsters due to an accident. With his dual identity, can he become the apex predator in this disaster?

altTitles.en: Return of the Player

altTitles.th: รีเทิร์น ทู เพลย์เยอร์

altTitles.ja: リターン・トゥ・プレイヤー

description.en:
Ten years ago, a group of gods turned everyone on Earth into players of a sadistic game that forced them to kill monsters in real life - or be killed themselves. 

Kim Sehan has already seen how this game will play out: everyone in the world dies except for him. 

When he’s given the chance to go back in time and start a second playthrough, Sehan is determined to change the course of events and beat the gods at their own game.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chognshengzuiqiangwanjia/list?title_no=1564)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2894)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2558)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2543)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001070)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2356)
description.fr:
Un jour, le monde est devenu un jeu. Les monstres qui apparaissent soudainement tuent des gens, et les gens doivent devenir des joueurs et terminer la quête ! Kim Se-han est revenu de la fin de l'humanité et c'est à présent sa deuxième partie en tant que joueur. Sera-t-il capable de détruire le «système» qui a mis fin au monde ?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/return-to-player/list?title_no=2574)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chognshengzuiqiangwanjia/list?title_no=1564)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2894)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2558)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2543)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001070)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/return-to-player/list?title_no=2356)
description.id:
Dunia telah berubah menjadi game! Setelah 10 tahun, Sehan berhasil menyelesaikan segalanya. Tetapi, ia memilih untuk memulai permainan dari awal dan menjalaninya lagi. Bisakah ia menyelamatkan dunia dan menghancurkan sistem yang membuat dunia berubah itu?

---

description.ko:
어느 날, 게임이 되어버린 세상.
갑자기 나타난 몬스터들이 사람들을 죽이고, 사람들은 플레이어가 되어 퀘스트를 달성해야 한다!
인류의 종말에서 회귀한 2회차 플레이어, 김세한.
그는 과연 세상을 이렇게 만든 '시스템'을 쳐부술 수 있을까!

description.ru:
В один день мир превратился в игру. Неожиданно появившиеся монстры стали убивать людей, а те в свою очередь были вынуждены начать выполнять различные квесты. Во всём этом хаосе апокалипсиса выделился игрок по имени Ким Сехан. Удастся ли ему найти и уничтожить систему, сделавшую мир таким?

description.zh:
游戏通关后结局竟是，
人类已灭亡？！
怪物肆虐，人类被迫成为游戏玩家。当游戏结束时世界只剩我一个幸存者，还被系统告知——单人模式结束，DLC商店开启。我竟然回到了游戏的第一天！
一切都可以重新再来，这次我将改变结局！

---

description.zh-hk:
變為遊戲的世界裡，唯有殺死怪物才得以生存! 第1局遊戲中唯一倖存的玩家—金世翰，獲得了二次挑戰的機會。他究竟是否能從這場眾神遊戲中獲勝? 還是依舊無法改變人類滅亡的命運?

altTitles.en: Jaejeu Cheoleom
Jaejeucheoreom
Джаз для двоих
재즈처럼

description.en: Tae Yi hears a familiar melody fill the empty halls and makes his way to the old music room. He knows his brother is dead, but he can’t help but hope, maybe, just maybe…it’s his brother playing his favorite song. When he slams open the door, however, he finds Se Heon, the new transfer student, at the piano. Disappointment comes crashing down and Tae Yi can’t control his anger. How dare Se Heon play his brother’s song? How dare he smile? How dare he say he loves jazz? “If I ever catch you playing the piano again…that’ll be the end of you.” And with that begins their story, as unpredictable and visceral as jazz.

altTitles.ja: 攻撃力ゼロから始める剣聖譚

altTitles.en: The Master Swordman's Story Starts with the Zero Ability to Attack

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện của Kiếm sĩ vô năng trên con đường trở thành Thánh Kiếm

altTitles.en: Tale of the Sword Saint Beginning with Zero Attack Power

description.en: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
description.es-la: Eugene procede de una familia de famosos espadachines, pero es tachado de "espadachín defectuoso" Que a pesar de poseer extraordinarias habilidades defensivas su poder ofensivo es basura. Abandona su país y se matricula en la principal escuela del continente, la Academia de Magia. En la academia, le piden a Eugene que vaya a lo más profundo de la prisión sellada, donde se se encuentran criaturas míticas y él es el único al que no afecta el miasma que estas desprenden. Sellado en las profundidades más oscuras de la prisión, donde incluso los más grandes magos de todos los tiempos caen de rodillas en el camino, se encuentra a la legendaria Rey Demonio Erinyes, que una vez gobernó el continente. Eugene llega fácilmente hasta ella, y ¿Parece que es el único que puede hacer un contrato con la Rey Demonio...? Una historia fantástica de otro mundo en la que un espadachín caído que se ha hecho con el poder del Rey Demonio ¡se convierte en el santo de la espada más fuerte! ¡Una historia que transcurre en el mismo universo de Shinja Zero Megami!

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.en: No, Miyahara, Not You!

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

altTitles.en: NoMiya

description.en: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.
